snippet: Timeless Torches, a dancing troupe with an average age of 60, held auditions on Saturday for a chance to perform during New York Liberty games and other sports events.
abstract: Timeless Torches, a troupe of 11 dancers who are almost all around 60 years old, holds auditions for a chance to perform during New York Liberty games and other local sporting events.
lead_paragraph: Timeless Torches, a dancing troupe with an average age of 60, held auditions on Saturday for a chance to perform during New York Liberty games and other sports events.

headline.seo: Courtside Troupe Seeks Dancers Who Defy Age and Other Stereotypes
headline.main: Courtside Troupe Seeks Dancers Who Defy Age and Other Stereotypes
headline.print_headline: Courtside Troupe Seeks Dancers Who Defy Age and Other Stereotypes
